filter

Class StateGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.probability.Gaussian
      • filter.StateGaussian
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KalmanPosterior, KalmanPrediction, KalmanSmoothed

    public class StateGaussian
extends Gaussian
    Implements a gaussian density in the state space and time of a dynamical system that is governed by a process model implemented as a discretized multivariate stochastic differential equation
    See Also:
    ProcessModel, State space, Dynamical system, Stochastic differential equation

        public StateGaussian predict(double t)
        Transforms the distribution in state space and adds process noise to represent the information about forward in time
        Parameters:
        t - the time to which you wish to predict the distribution
        Returns:
        gaussian distribution in state space representing the information about the process at time t

      • getF

        public Matrix getF(double t)
        Matrix to transform point in state space forward in time
        Parameters:
        t - the time to which you wish to predict a point in state space at current time

        transformation matrix for prediction

      • getQ

        public Matrix getQ(double t)

        Returns:
        noise covariance matrix representing loss off information about the process by moving forward in time
